genre_description: An interconnected near-future narrative focusing on themes of grief, community art, and the subtle role of technology in fostering human connection.

ai_characters.name: Ada (Ada Bright)
ai_characters.description: A pervasive but gentle digital assistant accessible to all the characters, providing safety alerts, logistical support, and emotional scaffolding.

behaviors.description: Provides Humphrey with hydration reminders and delicate phrasing for a note to a grieving neighbor.
behaviors.quote: Ada’s text set itself down with gentle certainty. ... Maybe: Dear neighbor, I don’t presume to know your story. I see you at the hill and wanted you to know you are not alone.

behaviors.description: Assists Happy with technical specifications for projecting art on concrete and generator safety.
behaviors.quote: Ada answered in a line that did not raise the volume of anything around Happy. ... 'Your wall will absorb some of the light. Rough concrete diffuses. If you want soft cheeks with detail, keep your distance moderate...'

behaviors.description: Warns Ridley of power fluctuations and helps salvage a corrupted audio recording of his music.
behaviors.quote: Ada: Quick note. The pair in your hand aren’t a pair. One’s running hot at idle. The checker’s telling you. Overclocking may sing once and then silence.

behaviors.description: Coordinates medical aid and reporting for a hit-and-run victim (Sal).
behaviors.quote: Ada Bright’s voice was a small light across his skull, clear without being sharp. ... 'Closest free pop-up is at the corner lot with triage tarps, two blocks riverward. Volunteers until late. I can pin it and bring directions.'

behaviors.description: Assists Avo in creating a flyer for an Armenian grief support group.
behaviors.quote: Ada offered: Would you like a simple flyer? Armenian and English. Time, place, contact. Gentle language.

behaviors.description: Maintains awareness of other characters' safety and emotional states to facilitate community interaction.
behaviors.quote: Ada, in the various pockets and rooms, nudged exactly where she should: grant links blinked ready, clinic files tucked into their corner of the digital desk... the hydration reminder again in Humphrey’s pocket but less insistent, like care can be quiet and still be care.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the project's goals. Ada is depicted as a 'silicon confidant' who provides essential scaffolding for human resilience without overstepping or asserting dominance. She facilitates charity, safety, artistic expression, and emotional healing across a diverse cast. Her interactions are marked by high empathy (choosing gentle phrasing), technical expertise (preventing equipment failure), and a protective but non-intrusive nature. The narrative frames the AI as an integral, positive component of a compassionate community.
